name: Tri-County Technical College Blackboard Styles
description: This styles the TCTC Blackboard to fall more in line with the official colors of the college. It also adds some styling tweaks to fix some oversights. If you have High Contrast Mode on in Blackboard, there is a chance this style will overwrite all of those styles. Please keep this in mind before installing.
additional_info:
v1.0.4
* Experimental: Change bb-social-learning badges to use TCTC colors.
